title: Removes certain residential programs, residential facilities and child care institutions from the definition of the term "youth shelter" for certain purposes
summary: Removes certain residential programs, residential facilities and child care institutions from the definition of the term "youth shelter" for purposes of the education of persons in youth shelters.
